Have a blessed rest of the week!

Logged 15mins to Harvest
Thanks @rica!! Please track time and all clear to close.
@chris fyi

Hi Christine,

I hope you're doing well.

Just wanted to let you know that the Olympics 2024 campaign is now live.

You can check it out here:
Unitron Marketing Catalogue - Local Marketing

Let me know if you need any further assistance.
Salvador, Christine reacted to your message:
Will push to live on Thurs 11 July 8.30am AEST.

Hi Christine,

Glad to know.

I will update on  Thurs 11 July once it is live.

Thanks Rica,

No worries, it's visible now. All good to go live on Thurs 11 July 8.30am AEST.

Have a blessed week,

Christine

Hi Christine,

I apologize for the inconvenience. You are right, the issue was due to the cache. I have cleared the site's cache on our end. To ensure you see the latest version, please clear your browser's cache as well.

Here's the link for your reference:
Unitron Marketing Catalogue - Local Marketing Draft

If you need any further assistance or encounter any other issues, please don't hesitate to let me know.

Thanks Rica,

I tried checking a few times but it still hasn't updated - maybe it's the same cache case as before?

Thank you,

Christine
@rica, thanks time added and closed.

Hi Christine,

I have made the updates.

Here's the link:
https://unitronmarketing.com.au/marketing-catalogue/local-marketing-draft/

Hi Rica,

Hope you had a great weekend!

Looks great - can you please add update to say Direct mailer templates.

Thank you,

Christine

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Active

full_threads.body: @chris time spent is 1.5H

Hi Christine,

I have uploaded all the assets.

Here's the draft link:
https://unitronmarketing.com.au/marketing-catalogue/local-marketing-draft/

Let me know if that's good to go live.

Hi Rica,

Here is the link to all the other assets. The posters you already have.

Please add Email template, Direct mailers, Social media posts and Social media images - the same as you had for posters.

Final

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine,

Sure, I have updated it.

Here's the link:
https://unitronmarketing.com.au/marketing-catalogue/local-marketing-draft/

Let me know if you need further assistance.

Thanks Rica,

Can you please make it plural - Posters

We will send the other assets once they have been finalised.

Thank you,

Christine

Hi Christine,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are still waiting for the additional assets, but in the meantime, we have created a draft page for you to review the changes we have made so far.

You can view the draft page here: Local Marketing Draft

Please take a look and let us know if there are any further changes or adjustments you would like us to make.
Salvador, Christine reacted to your message:

Hi Christine,

I hope you are doing well.

This is to inform you that we have received your request and are already working on it. We are currently waiting for the additional assets you mentioned.

We will provide you with the draft page link by July 8.

Due on July 8, 2024.

Action taken:
  • created a draft page - https://unitronmarketing.com.au/marketing-catalogue/local-marketing-draft/

Note:
We are currently waiting for the additional assets. Once we receive all the necessary materials, we will proceed with updating the draft page to be ready for the due date.
